For higher concentration of ZnI 2 (5%), UV–vis absorption measurements indicate no change in the band gap, but the XRD pattern ( Figure S1) shows a stronger PbI 2 peak at 12.55° in addition to extra diffraction peaks which suggest less-oriented crystal domains and the presence of more FAPbI 3 δ-phase (11.47°, 21.13°, and 30.17°).
